attributes.action: Start high school and college at 10am instead of 9am.
attributes.additional_details: So that school people have a better education and better mental health.
attributes.background: I would like high schools and colleges to start at 10am instead of 9am so that school kids and college kids have longer in bed which will result in a better education due to their longer rest time.

rejection.details: Decisions on school and opening times are a matter for the school or college in question.
